segments.text: Did you go to the concert last weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I didn't . And you ? Was it good ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did . I enjoyed it a lot.There was a folk singer , a violinist and a pianist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I only paid two dollars for mine .
segments.speaker: S1
